sentences.en: -- And sad, because he missed his heavenly kindred!
sentences.cn: —— 他也很伤心, 因为他思念他在天国里的亲属!

sentences.en: English and Dutch are kindred languages.
sentences.cn: 英语和荷兰语是同源的语言.

sentences.en: He and I are kindred spirits.

sentences.cn: 他声称跟王室有亲戚关系.

sentences.en: He found kindred spirits in the peace movement.
sentences.cn: 他在和平运动中找到了志同道合的人.

sentences.en: Help for the Bastille prisoner's kindred in La Force!
sentences.cn: 到拉福斯营救巴士底囚徒的亲人!

sentences.en: His kindred are still living in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他的亲戚仍住在爱尔兰.

sentences.en: Italian and Spanish are kindred languages.
sentences.cn: 意大利和西班牙的语言起源是相同的.

sentences.en: Most of his kindred still live in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他的亲戚大部分仍住在爱尔兰.

sentences.en: Mr. Bunting , by a kindred impulse, peered under the desk.
sentences.cn: 本丁先生也同样灵机一动, 看了一下桌子底下.

sentences.en: Our bare feet know the kindred touch.
sentences.cn: 我们赤裸的双脚可以感觉到这种血肉联系.

sentences.en: She revealed to the child that he was not of her kindred.
sentences.cn: 她向孩子透露说他并不是她的亲生儿.

sentences.en: The offender made proper restitution to the victim's kindred.
sentences.cn: 违法者对受害人亲属给予了适当的补偿。

sentences.en: The protest included members of Free the Streets and kindred organisations.
sentences.cn: 参加此次抗议的包括“解放街头”组织以及类似团体的成员。

sentences.en: They were all kindred and similar peoples, hardy herdsmen who had taken to plunder.
sentences.cn: 他们都是有着血缘关系的相似民族, 是一些喜欢劫掠的剽悍牧民.

trans.tran_cn: 同宗的， 同源的，类似的， 相似的
trans.tran_en: belonging to the same group or family
